title: True Runes (Suikoden IV Trailer)
content:
Anyone know what font this is? (I have more examples if needed).   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25631.jpg)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25632.jpg)
author: toketsu

comments.content: It would help to have a few more upper case letters, like a G and M, if possible. Or a better closeup of the word 'forgiveness'.

Hm, I'm thinking "Men's Health" here.. Some variant of Century Condensed maybe? I have no idea what I'm talking about, Mr. Simonson should turn up any minute ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

Hmm. This is tougher than it looks. At first I was thinking something like Utopia or Walbaum, but no. It does have a very Century look to it, but the R would be totally out of place in a Century face. It's more of a Baskerville R.

I don't have any bigger screenshots, as it's from a 320x240 trailer.   
Here's a few more -- the ones with the "Sky" background might be different, it could be that the other screenshots' font is a compressed version of the "In 2004..." font.   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25663.jpg)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25664.jpg)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25665.jpg)   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25666.jpg)

This might help, too. I'm pretty sure this has been optically condensed, so I stretched out some of the samples:   
   
 ![rune](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516142611im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/25668.jpg)

It kind of shares a similarity with "Latin MT", too, if you expand it a bit.   
   
\>Ok, scratch that, I have no idea what I'm talking about, heh. These kinds of fonts are something I know nothing about.

hmm, that seems to be close enough, or exact.   
   
It seems... A winner is You.
No, it's not a match, but very similar. There's something maddenly familiar about the sample, though. My guess is it will turn out to be something very common. I just can't place it.
No, the serifs are slightly off, among other things.. And Mark was the one who brought up Utopia
Go for it. I'm tapped out on this one.
hmm, too bad I can't get in contact with Konami, maybe someone there would know? Although, I doubt they'd answer.
